text.page:
571
087-286a @##/ /dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas sman gyi bla bai DUr+ya 'od kyi rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /tad+ya thA/ oM b+hai Sha dz+ye b+hai Sha dz+ye/ ma hA b+hai Sha dz+ye/ b+hai Sha dz+ye sa mut+ga te swA hA/ sman gtong ba'i tshe sman la sngags kyis gdab pa rdzogs so/ /
